description: Production-ready MCP server for Redmine with security, pagination, and enterprise features

REDMINE_URL.description: URL of your Redmine server (e.g., https://your-redmine-server.com)

REDMINE_USERNAME.description: Redmine username for authentication (alternative to API key)

REDMINE_PASSWORD.description: Redmine password for authentication (alternative to API key)

REDMINE_API_KEY.description: Redmine API key for authentication (alternative to username/password)

SERVER_HOST.description: Host address for the MCP server (default: 0.0.0.0)

PUBLIC_HOST.description: Public hostname for file download URLs (default: localhost)

PUBLIC_PORT.description: Public port for file download URLs (default: 8000)

AUTO_CLEANUP_ENABLED.description: Enable automatic cleanup of expired files (default: true)

CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MINUTES.description: Interval between cleanup runs in minutes (default: 10)

ATTACHMENT_EXPIRES_MINUTES.description: Default expiry time for attachments in minutes (default: 60)
